channel.title: success on A techie blog!
channel.description: Recent content in success on A techie blog!

item.title: Planning Phase
item.description: Planning Phase is the first step after one has decided to achieve something. Why is a plan needed? Ask this question to a contractor who is building a huge complex. Although, in short you need a plan to know from where you starting and where you want to go and to layout a plan that would help you achieve it. Steps Make a specific goal, which is measurable. Gather the resources which you would need.

item.title: Key to success: Consistency
item.description: Intro I am going to write a few blog posts on things I consider are most important for success. This is part 1 of this series. Everyone needs to define meaning of success, what it means. A poor guy might want money, ill person would want health, a student might want good marks and job. Everyone has their own definition. So it is important to define one’s own definition of success.

item.title: What is success
item.description: Intro Success is a relative topic. One needs to grasp this concept to be happy. Success is about being the best in a class/field, but success is also to be able to spend time with family after a rough day and still smile and be with them. Success is also being able to play with your mom/dad after coming back from school. Success is health during these tough times, its being able to get medical care and vaccine and its also having others around you be aware of the importance of being vaccinated.
